name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a separate pan, sautÃ© the pancetta or guanciale until crispy. Remove from heat and drain excess fat.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, grated Pecorino Romano, and grated Parmesan cheese. Season with black pepper.
Toss the cooked pasta with the egg and cheese mixture while it's still hot. Add the crispy pancetta and minced garlic. Mix well to coat the pasta.
Serve immediately, garnished with chopped fresh parsley.

name: Chicken Stir-Fry
ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, thinly sliced
2 cups mixed vegetables (e.g., bell peppers, broccoli, carrots), sliced
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a wok or large skillet, heat the vegetable oil over high heat.
Add the minced garlic and ginger, and stir-fry for about 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add the sliced chicken and cook until it's no longer pink and slightly browned.
Add the mixed vegetables and continue to stir-fry for a few minutes until they are tender-crisp.
Stir in the soy sauce and oyster sauce. Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve the chicken stir-fry hot over cooked rice.
